original_text: Instead of which king Rehoboam made shields of brass, and committed them to the hands of the chief of the guard, that kept the entrance of the king's house.
korean_text: 르호보암 왕이 그 대신에 놋으로 방패를 만들어 궁문을 지키는 경호 책임자들의 손에 맡기매

sentences.original_text: Instead of which king Rehoboam made shields of brass
sentences.korean_translation: 대신에 르호보암 왕이 놋으로 방패를 만들었고

sentences.original_text: and committed them to the hands of the chief of the guard
that kept the entrance of the king's house
